theme.name: Premium Automotive Excellence
theme.aesthetic: Sleek, modern, and luxurious with bold geometric elements
theme.targetAudience: Affluent car enthusiasts and luxury vehicle buyers aged 30-55
theme.designPrinciples: Clean lines, premium materials, performance-focused imagery, and trust-building elements
theme.gradientStyle: Dynamic angular gradients that evoke speed and motion

animations.heroAnimations: Smooth fade-in with subtle upward motion and staggered element reveals
animations.pageTransitions: Seamless slide transitions with opacity changes
animations.hoverEffects: Subtle scale transforms and color transitions on interactive elements
animations.loadingAnimations: Elegant skeleton loaders and progressive image reveals

hero.description: Sleek sports car on a modern highway at sunset
hero.parallaxEffect: Medium speed parallax with depth blur effect
hero.overlayStyle: Dark gradient overlay (black to transparent) for text readability

sections.description: Luxury car showroom with premium lighting
Collection of luxury vehicles in dramatic lighting
sections.overlayStyle: Gradient overlay from bottom to top

pages.name: Homepage
pages.layout: Hero section with dynamic car showcase, featured models grid, about section, testimonials, and premium contact form

pages.name: Vehicle Lineup
pages.layout: Interactive vehicle gallery with filtering, detailed specifications, and comparison tools

pages.name: About
pages.layout: Company story, heritage timeline, team profiles, and manufacturing excellence showcase

pages.name: Contact
pages.layout: Premium contact form, showroom locations with maps, and service scheduling

interactiveElements.videoBackgrounds: Subtle looping videos of cars in motion for hero sections
interactiveElements.3dElements: Interactive 360-degree car viewers and rotating logo animations
interactiveElements.particleEffects: Subtle floating particles that suggest speed and luxury
interactiveElements.morphingShapes: Dynamic geometric shapes that transform based on scroll position

leadCaptureForm.style: Elegant glassmorphism design with floating labels and smooth focus animations
leadCaptureForm.purpose: Capture qualified leads for test drives and vehicle inquiries
leadCaptureForm.submitAction: Send email notification and redirect to thank you page with next steps
leadCaptureForm.animations: Smooth field focus states, success animations, and error handling with gentle shake effects

layouts.scrollTriggerEffects: Elements reveal with fade-in and slide-up animations triggered at 20% viewport entry
layouts.backgroundVideoReveals: Hero video backgrounds that start playing when section becomes visible
layouts.glassmorphismElements: Frosted glass effect cards for testimonials and feature highlights
layouts.neonAccents: Subtle red accent lines and borders that pulse gently on key CTAs
layouts.ctaExperience: Premium buttons with micro-interactions, including hover states that suggest forward motion and progress
